SYS-001.description: CAN interface can0 is down or not detected.
SYS-001.action: Check physical CAN connection and verify kernel modules are loaded with forklift_health node. Restart the forklift.

SYS-002.action: Run setup command manually with verbose output to diagnose. Restart the forklift.

SYS-004.description: Critical ROS node is not running.
SYS-004.action: Restart the ROS node and check node logs for crashes.

SYS-005.description: Expected ROS topic is not being published.
SYS-005.action: Verify the publisher node is active and healthy.

SYS-006.description: Teleop docker container is not running.
SYS-006.action: Start the teleop docker container and check logs for errors.

HW-001.description: Drive motor controller reported a fault code.
HW-001.action: Check logs for specific flash code diagnosis.
